pages.title: Farmer hides a body while cat watches
pages.message: Hey friends, thanks so much for checking out our comic! And also for your patience as we polish and repolish this chapter. Third time's the charm!

pages.title: The First Visitor Appears!
pages.message: Can you spot the monster? I'll give you a hint, depending on who's telling the story, it DOESN'T have glowing red eyes :o

pages.title: A Visitor Appears...
pages.message: Last panel: me when my husband comes into the dark cave in which I make art and tells me I need to go touch grass.

pages.title: Visitor gets schooled by mystery legs
pages.message: Speaking of which, what kinds of tricks have you taught your pet?

pages.title: Cat Connection over a Dead Body
pages.message: eh...I'm sure the boy will be fine. He seems to be in capable hands...er, claws.

pages.title: Mysterious lady pets mysterious cat
pages.message: This page will look vastly similar to it's predecessor, although what you guys may not know is that I made all of the pages from the og prologue to the end of chapter 2 with no bleeds...which means a future headache for me when we get to printing the book 😱 (all my graphic designer homies know what I'm talking about) ...so I'm taking the opportunity as I go through to extend the illustrations out where necessary (not to be seen here since I crop the pages back down to their intended size for publishing on the web).

pages.title: Mysterious woman hands off God Blood
pages.message: Never underestimate your local cat lady. She may be a drug dealer.

pages.title: The Town Border has seen better days
pages.message: ....also the local pizza delivery guy is packing... I mean, this is Wisconsin after all and I'm sure Donny has had to fight off a pizza-enthusiast or two in his day. I'm sure that's what the gun is for...

pages.title: Donny is taking his chances and going through downtown
pages.message: That's like when all my friends advised me to NOT procrastinate and stay up all night, starting and finishing my project the night before it was due. I'm sure things will go as smoothly for him as they did for me...🥴

pages.title: Donny biking through downtown Shenee
pages.message: Seeing how Gramp's Garage is fairing with that totally normal mist, I hope Gramps is doing okay.

pages.title: Donny passes suspicious mailbox
pages.message: That mailbox be cranking its neck around like it caught you talking smack 'bout its momma 📮✨

pages.title: Mailbox tackles Donny
pages.message: Mailbox angy (╬▔皿▔)╯

pages.title: Guns don't seem to work on mailboxes
pages.message: Mailbox Intel: Besides teenagers with baseball bats, weakness unknown.

pages.title: Mailbox climbs light pole
pages.message: The neighborhood is in unanimous agreement. "Nope" levels have gotten out of hand since the immergence of the multi-legged, needle-mouthed, hornet-nested mailboxes. Job satisfaction in the postal service is plummeting. Do not expect prime delivery times.

pages.title: Mailbox got needles but Donny got stabby stab
pages.message: Mailbox may have needles, but Donny got that stabby stab. Also! You may have noticed some additions to our website's read page! Navigation buttons have been updated to be easier to spot, so depending on if you are a web or mobile user, you will find the buttons sticking to the bottom of your screen or to the right of the page. We're also SUPER excited to now offer email notifications for those who want to stay updated when pages are live! 😁

pages.title: A New Challenger approaches aka red-cloaked chain-wielder
pages.message: If only we all were so lucky to have a red-cloaked, fog friend wielding a chain lasso to help solve life's problems.

pages.title: Life Update 03.20.2023
pages.message: ...and words cannot describe how thrilled we are!!!! Thank you all for your love and support and we're excited to bring you the next installment of pages next Monday!!! 😁🎉

pages.title: Beacon is summoned to take down mailbox visitor
pages.message: Down with the mailbox gremlin!! Also, got me wondering what kind of moves the last skinwalker was making that made him so unconvincing 🤔

pages.title: Donny asserts his humanity
pages.message: hmmm...I wonder what those percentages could mean 👀

pages.title: Pizza Man Released
pages.message: As an avid fan of my wife's art, I can't stop admiring the pointing hand in the second panel. If I had attempted that it probably would have looked like something else...

pages.title: Pizza Man Can't Catch a Break
pages.message: I hate it when nights go to heck. Street-puddle soaked pizza? Ugh. Almost as bad as the tax hikes for installing gun turrets on top of these night buses.

pages.title: Jean helps Donny get to house
pages.message: One of the many good reasons to remember those special moments with your significant other ...might save your life one day!

pages.title: Mysterious boy is still alive-ish
pages.message: At least one of these kiddos is having a somewhat restful night 😬💤 And just like that friends, we've reached the end of the NEW PROLOGUE!!! Thanks for hanging with us as we cleaned up some confusing bits at the beginning of our comic! Nathan and I love doing this and are thrilled to have you along for the ride 🚴‍♀️

pages.title: First Blood Title Page
pages.message: It's here! Hang on to your couch, office chair, or whatever seat you're reading from! We're about to officially get started... (づ￣ 3￣)づ

pages.title: Horse-pulled dumptruck carting around large unnamed monster feet
pages.message: Reporting live from downtown Shenee, WI: horse-pulled garbagetruck transporting large, unnamed monster feet. Not the only peculiar sighting this Sunday morning...

pages.title: Rose finds drugs?
pages.message: Season 1 starting off with a happy dance! What do you think is in the bottle??? Comment your guess in our discord chat!

pages.title: Rose escapes her mother's room
pages.message: From butchering beasts in high heels to jumping out of windows in flip flops...we need to get these girls some sneakers!

pages.title: Donny discovers Rose's escape measures
pages.message: Don't know what Jean usually listens to on her ipod, but it's "ffmmping!"

pages.title: Rose embarrasses herself in front of cats
pages.message: Them cats know a good purple manicure when they see it.

pages.title: Who is the Penguin man?
pages.message: New page and lots of new faces! But the most important face of all...this elusive Mr. Freezy Cee...

pages.title: Zylo is seeing things, and those things have a lot of teeth
pages.message: I could have sworn she had less teeth in the last pannel.

pages.title: He DEFINITELY likes me...
pages.message: You may have wondered if penguin boy has flippers for hands or if it's just part of his costume. Well now you know, you're welcome.

pages.title: Rose coming in hot
pages.message: Poor Mr. "Definitely Not Mr. Freezy Cee" can't catch a break.

pages.title: Rose and Casper Collision
pages.message: And that, kids, was how I met your mother. Hahaha just kidding...unless...

pages.title: Oh nononono Rose got God Blood on her blood
pages.message: Oh nononono, Rose got "God Blood" on her blood. I'm sure everything's fine.

pages.title: He's Bouncy like Rubber, BOING!
pages.message: It's okay dude, we know what One Piece is and WE think you're cool.

pages.title: Blush Overload and Jealous Rage
pages.message: Someone may be jealous... but jury is still out on that.

pages.title: A hero is needed, and Casper will have to do
pages.message: When that rando kid thinks they are the main character.

pages.title: We Moved to Wisconsin
pages.message: Hey guys! So you may have heard we were buying a house. The house is no more! In the mean time, we are setting up camp in Wisconsin (the home of the Monsters and Myriads comic ironically). We're just now getting settled in and figuring out our future adventures. So no new page today, however, pages will continue this Thursday (November 4th). Also, Happy Belated Halloween, you spooky hooligans!

pages.title: Your....Vanilla Cones
pages.message: I don't know which part made me happier to draw, the icecream on the kitty's nose, or Casper vrooooming off into the sunset. Or maybe the phantom newcomer in the depths of the Freezy Cee's custard shack...

pages.title: Here enters the Elusive Mr. Freezy Cee
pages.message: The man, the myth, the legend, Mr. Freezy Cee!! Dropping some hot takes and hard facts. Posting from Colorado Springs this morning (my concept of time has been severely crippled between moving from Ohio to Wisconsin to Colorado, during a daylight savings no less 🙀).

pages.title: Mr Freezy Cee on the philosophy of penguin pajamas
pages.message: This just in: Mr. Freezy Cee on the philosophy of penguin pajamas.

pages.title: Just about anything can make you interesting
pages.message: Zylo "unmasked", not a penguin after all.

pages.title: Hacker Chick and her Nut Cracker immerges
pages.message: Little known hallmark film coming out this season...Hacker and the NuT Cracker. Buy your tickets today!

pages.title: I'm sure your deserted little twin brothers are fine...
pages.message: I'm sure your deserted little twin brothers are fine, Casper. I mean, they had icecream and an absurd lack of supervision to keep them company.

pages.title: Rose may be tripping afterall
pages.message: Well Rose is certainly tripping on something.

pages.title: Maybe we're both high?
pages.message: Have I been playing too much Pikmin Bloom, or does Quill's ghost need a name? I'm leaning towards Reginald but I am open to suggestions.

pages.title: Uncle Dan finds the kiddos with a broken window
pages.message: All things considered, both Uncle Dan and Rose are taking it all rather well. (⊙_⊙;)

pages.title: Uncle Dan to the rescue
pages.message: Typical.

pages.title: Rose isn't crazy, and Quill is gonna help her
pages.message: I didn't grow up with cousins my age, but I imagine this is how general cousinly bickering would go.

pages.title: Chapter 2 Killing Time in Detention
pages.message: Woot woot!! Heading into the next chapter! Thank you all for checking out our comic up til this point! This marks the start of the Monsters & Myriads holiday hiatus where we the creators will be making some fun edits to be revealed this coming January. In the meantime, check out our Discord to join in the conversation and share your ideas/theories. We love to hear from you guys! Merry Christmas all and see you in the new year! 🎄⛄

pages.title: Holiday Hiatus 2022
pages.message: Hey guys! I hope your holidays were warm and filled with great memories! Over the last few weeks, we've discussed our vision for this comic at length and have finally decided to *drum roll please* remake the prologue for Monsters & Myriads!! 🥳🥂 The one we have now served its purpose in teaching us a lot of lessons about making comics, but over the next few weeks, we intend to breathe new life into the beginning of our novel, setting more clear expections and setting for the story. We will restart our posting schedule the last monday of the month, January 31.

pages.title: Casper floating over grayed out farm
pages.message: Coming to you live, boy in flannel pajamas floating in the sky.

pages.title: Casper knock knock on barn door and it hisses
pages.message: Oh dear, Casper. What have you gotten yourself into...

pages.title: Just give me a sign
pages.message: Fire laurel? Check. All the credentials you need for nefarious metaphorical parasite removal.

pages.title: Hooded lady isn't quite feeling herself
pages.message: Wonder who "it" is...a friend? ...probs not.

pages.title: Rat Monster and a Rude Awakening
pages.message: Alright, time to count 'em all. How many rats in the rat monster. Note: no picking up, shaking, or breaking the rat monster. That's cheating and will lead to disqualification. Rats will be counted by the end of the week and the winner will be notified by messenger pigeon...if said pigeon isn't devoured in the counting process.

pages.title: My Favorite Comic "One Part" and Blackmail
pages.message: Siblings, your gateway drug into blackmail. Also, previously noted rat counting contest has been cancelled. Artist does not know nor desires to know number of rats and warns against long exposure to said rats.

pages.title: Casper Cat Staring Contest
pages.message: The Casper Cat Stare-off of year *REDACTED*, an age old tradition passed down by the *REDACTED* and hence the birth of the earmuff. Also, what's with the funny-looking smudge on the neighbor's roof?

pages.title: Wake up in the morning feeling like p diddy
pages.message: Ah yes, brothers and cat and spectral, tea-drinking shadow gathering about for some late night manga reading. When you can't live your best life, you write about it and make your wife draw it.

pages.title: Casper's Morning Rush!
pages.message: Full transparency here, this is a pretty regular Sunday morning for me. No kids to wrangle or siblings to fend off, and yet I still can't seem to get to church on time. ⏰😅

pages.title: Millie's Manipulation
pages.message: Not many highschoolers can drive in Shenee, and with gas prices as ludicrously high as they are even fewer can afford to drive. Good thing Millie the Magnificent's got a lucrative carpool deal worked with the rich parents! Sure would suck to not be able to afford gas...I SAID IT SURE WOULD SUCK TO-ah, forget it. Guess it's a great time to pick up running, huh? 🏃‍♂️🏃‍♀️

pages.title: Ride to school in the Millie Mobile
pages.message: Guhhhh, I hate it when I can't really remember my dream but can kinda remember parts of it or at least get mad deja vu when something random happens later that day. It's like finishing an ice-cream cone and not being able to describe what it tasted like.

pages.title: Casper remembers the surgeon
pages.message: Ya'll have any awkward stories from highschool? Haha yup me neither that's crazy! But if I did there may be one or two that started with the sudden urge to cold approach a girl.

pages.title: Oh yeah, it's all coming together.
pages.message: *kronk voice* "Oh yeah, it's all coming together."

pages.title: Casper attempts an intervention, and is interventioned himself
pages.message: Casper, my man, attempts an intervention...only to be subject to another intervention. Intervenception.

pages.title: Zylo confronts Casper
pages.message: Happy Easter, everyone! I... I said HAPPY, oh forget it. If you're going to be like that, Zylo, might as well divert that pent up rage towards someone who deserves it... like whoever ordered all the snow this morning...

pages.title: Rose puts her foot in her mouth
pages.message: HAHA how does that foot taste, Rose? ......wait. no. That came out weird. Cause putting your foot in your mouth--forget I said anything... (⊙﹏⊙)

pages.title: Casper Protecting Rose from Penguin Guy?
pages.message: I didn't know Casper had it in him! Oh... oh wait, yup sweaty Casper's back. (っ °Д °;)っ Didn't take much.

pages.title: Vice Principal Lopez Appears Stage Left
pages.message: RIP Casper's spotless record. His mom's gonna love this.

pages.title: Zylo and Casper get detention
pages.message: In this world, you're either a Casper or a Zylo. For me? 100% a Casper. I nearly peed my pants when I got written up by campus safety for stargazing on the crosscountry fields.

pages.title: Rose and Quill late for class...but not?
pages.message: I don't think Quill's the OOoonly one trying to "find someone"... if you know what I mean 😉

pages.title: Spooky School Wanderings
pages.message: Yech. Lunch hasn't even happened yet, and those tables are...hygienically challenged. Whoever is in charge of cleaning those tables needs a raise. Or to be fired. Or to get a raise, and then get fired.

pages.title: School Eavesdropping Part 1
pages.message: Once there was a student body vote on the most hated thing in the school, and while the lunch table filth was the official first place winner, everyone knew the ballot write-in's for Vice Principal Lopez won by a vast majority.

pages.title: Should have burned those bloody clothes
pages.message: Red dress? They're robes, Chief. If they were dresses I would have drawn them as such.🙄 On another note, who else would pay money to see Vice Principal Lopez and Chief Garrison get a few punches in? ✋🥊

pages.title: Stumbled upon Millie giving a head massage
pages.message: It would seem Millie is a fan of The Killers.......the more you know! Understanding one's music taste is a window into their soul, if they have one. 💀

pages.title: Millie makes speedy escape through ceiling
pages.message: Millie exits stage up.

pages.title: Rose pushed Lopez a little too far
pages.message: Lopez got dog owner/toddler mom energy when they see they're baby horking down on something they know ain't food.

pages.title: Happy Memorial Day
pages.message: Hey friends, hope you all had a wonderful Memorial Day weekend! No new pages this week TT_TT but here is a mini comic for you! Check back next Monday (June 7th) for two new pages! If you haven't already, you can join our discord to get notifications when pages are posted and join in some story discussions (link at the bottom of the webpage)!

pages.title: Rose says she knows nothing...teachers seem to think otherwise
pages.message: We're back!! And two more candidates have joined the "Detention Squad"

pages.title: The DOT is going to have to keep an eye on those two
pages.message: What kind of "nifty toys" does the Department of Tourism really need. Like, a really nice self-folding map?

pages.title: What's Going On???
pages.message: Can you sum up your entire thought process over the course of a Monday school day with a 3-word sentence? Can relate.

pages.title: 3 o'clock detention crew
pages.message: Ah, the motley Detention Crew spearheaded by the famed Mr. Barr, still down for his "old person" nap...

pages.title: Rubber Band Burns
pages.message: Update coming in later than usual due to us roadtrippin' south for a few days. Nothing like a nice bumpy carride to put artist behind, I've discovered.

pages.title: Quill Quips
pages.message: Oof. Bullies suck, but getting laughed out of a room by the girl you asked out is pretttty rough. Let's hope Rose's menacing baseball ex boyfriend is level-headed enough to keep the peace.

pages.title: Chuck knows something about Sam
pages.message: Gotta hand it to her, Rose can turn the dramatics on and off like *snapping emoji* ...like, where did that handkerchief even come from anyways? ALSO, HEADS UP: Starting today and through the month of July, we will be reducing to ONE PAGE a week. This is for several reasons, mainly a sister's wedding 🥂🥳 and Nate and I moving into OUR NEW HOME!!! It's been a long haul but we are BEYOND thrilled to move out of the basement we have been calling home for the last 8 months (can't believe it's been that long)!! Plus all the traveling and packing required, we thought it best to slim down, but rest assured! Our regular TWO PAGES per week will return in August on this comic's 1 YEAR ANNIVERSARY!!!! 🍾🥳🙌

pages.title: Rose and Chuck back together...?
pages.message: Be thankful you only have to read Chuck...I have to sketch, ink, color, and shade all 15 or so panels of the jerkface. TT_TT

pages.title: Oh, so Chuck might know what happened to Sam
pages.message: Yeah, with gas being $28.99 a gallon...that doesn't sound like something you just "borrow." And I'm not making that number up neither, check the prologue if you don't believe me ;)

pages.title: Sometimes it's best not to provoke the school jerk, Casper
pages.message: *munches softly*

pages.title: Turning over a new leaf...
pages.message: You ever catch yourself mid-story and realize that maybe telling this story was a bad...bad idea? But there's no way out of it because at that point, you have the room's full attention? ...yeaaah, Nate and I like to write what we know.

pages.title: We Gotta LEAF!!
pages.message: Excuse me Casper, I believe you mean "We gotta LEAF! He's Coming!"

pages.title: Detention is Getting Spicey
pages.message: All the back-to-school essentials: paper, pencils, a bad attitude, erasers--CRIKE, IS THAT A GUN!?

pages.title: Bite it to be sure. It might be a metaphor.
pages.message: Bite it to be sure. It might be a metaphor.

pages.title: Sky's Out, Knives Out
pages.message: Get yo'self a Quill.

pages.title: The fight has begun
pages.message: I mean, Casper is supposed to be this anime nerd...but the boi doesn't miss his hip thrusts and bulgarians, that's for sure O_O

pages.title: Patrick goes full Waluigi stomp on Casper
pages.message: Drawing Pat in the final panel was giving me some mad deja vu, but I couldn't put my finger on who he reminded me of......Waluigi, it was Waluigi.

pages.title: Casper sweep the leg
pages.message: Stomp it. Sweep it. Bop it.

pages.title: Casper wins his first fight
pages.message: When you take down two armed bullies, single-handedly rescuing your highschool's sweetheart, Rose Stewart, all while haloed by literal fire, and still no one notices.

pages.title: Rose the Gun! Right!
pages.message: Not everyone thinks best on their feet.

pages.title: Happy Labor Day
pages.message: Happy Labor Day, friends!! More pages are coming this week, so don't worry! We won't leave you hanging...but in the meantime, enjoy this kitty taking a nap in honor of the holiday 🐈

pages.title: Chuck does big slash. Big effective.
pages.message: Don't run, play, or turn around suddenly with knives, kids. Or better yet...forget knives. Sporks are the ultimate utensil.

pages.title: Casper got got
pages.message: Don't worry guys, just RGB red light pixels on your screen. No friends were hurt in the making of this comic.

pages.title: Quill shakes down Mr. Barr
pages.message: Just remember. There was a point this past week that I was sitting at my computer, thinking about what sort of sound "Quill shakes an unconscious Mr. Barr" makes. DM me if you have suggestions that smack "Wa-Whoosh" out of the competition.

pages.title: Chucks busts out the window
pages.message: Bippity boppity boop, Chuck has flown the coop.

pages.title: Desperate times call for desperate measures
pages.message: Oh cute! They're working together...toooo throw Casper out the second story window.

pages.title: Chapter 3 Cover - Roadtrip with Death
pages.message: Fun fact: although Millie is the youngest of the main characters, she is the only one that knows how to drive. Legally, that is.

pages.title: I didn't QUITE kill him
pages.message: Chapter 3 baby!! You know who loooooves drawing backgrounds?!?! ....cause, like, if you know anyone, send them over my way, kay?

pages.title: Suspicious Skeleton guy in the van with Millie
pages.message: Now how many of you saw the beat-up van with a trail of smoke coming out of it on the last page and thought it was a blunt? Now be honest...

pages.title: Introducing Mors
pages.message: Death isn't always ragged cloaks and bloody scythes. Sure there's that part, the fun bit everyone sees, but there's a lot of paperwork that has to happen behind-the-scenes, a lot of checks and balances that have to add up. With that much deskwork stacking up, the Grim Reaper practically had to invent accounting. Too bad he's too busy to refresh his wardrobe more than every hundred years or so. 🤓

pages.title: Death Puns #1
pages.message: We love to see a friend who laughs at terrible jokes. We much less love if they are death incarnate, but hey! Sometimes the puns are bad enough you can't be picky... 💀

pages.title: Girl's still waiting for her undead cat
pages.message: Girl's still waiting for her undead cat! Get on that, good sir!

pages.title: Here enters Mr. Barr in the ink
pages.message: For all those who are worried for Mr. Barr's well-being and for the people sending me messages like 'Is Mr. Barr okay? He looks like a limp noodle' and 'We want more souls of doughy old men!' the wait is over! Presenting Mr. Barr, in the flesh -err... black goo.

pages.title: Mr. Barr goes to hell
pages.message: The River Styx needed a fresh, new look for the modern age...thus the banker drawer dating early 1900s.

pages.title: Contract out for Farmer Findley's soul
pages.message: A skeleton and a young girl  //  Talk murder as coffee steam swirls  //  Alone in a van  //  With dangers at hand  //  That later next week will unfurl  //  I'm not the poet, she is. Happy Halloween 🎃

pages.title: Millie signs the contract for Farmer Finley
pages.message: The truly scariest thing about this page is the contract's eerie resemblance to a tax return form...

pages.title: Chuck runs past Millie with a gun
pages.message: Who says "JEEPERS!" these days, you may be asking yourself. It's me, I am the source material for Millie's exclamations.

pages.title: Casper gets yeeted
pages.message: The tender young age of... of what? Will Millie's ambiguous age forever remain a mystery? 😱

pages.title: Millie to the rescue!
pages.message: ...but at least the name of our grim skeleton friend has finally come to light.

pages.title: The gangs all here...
pages.message: One of these memories is not like the others... on another note! This is not only the first panel but the first PAGE that has all five of our kiddos together! Ready to get this party started!!

pages.title: Millie sees Casper all bloodied up
pages.message: Oh funny haha, is that Casper's watch? The one I definitely didn't forget to draw for the last 45 or so pages? Hahaha weird.

pages.title: Millie exits as quickly as she entered
pages.message: Millie seen fleeing the scene of the crime...I'm starting to think that this just might be her thing 🏃‍♀️

pages.title: A beginner's course in making mud plasters
pages.message: A beginner's guide to making mud plasters. Step 1: GET SOME LEAVES!!! ...any other Brian Regan fans? Just me, yup, okay 👍 coooool.

pages.title: Here enters van with a bang
pages.message: Zylo just having a crisis in the background.

pages.title: Packing into the van for some good local radio stations
pages.message: I don't know man... if I had to pick, I think I would want something that goes a little harder than midwestern emo covers 🎸 ...assuming that's what's hot on Shen FM. Also, oh my gosh guys it's our 100th page!!! 🥳🎉 I'm so so so thankful Nathan and I get to share this story with you guys! Thank you for all of the love and support!!

pages.title: Van cruising off into the sunset
pages.message: It's probably the monster fur that makes them so soft....at least her hands don't have extra wriggly fingers like the van's bumper pal.

pages.title: Casper slumps, Zylo grumps
pages.message: Page Summary: Casper slumps and Zylo grumps, but also, John Bender?

pages.title: Zylo calls Millie skeleton girl
pages.message: Throw back to Zylo's "penguin boy" era. 🐧
